com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport

Class Transport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Transport

  • public class Transport
extends java.lang.Object
    UPA transport is used by an OMM Interactive Provider to create listening sockets and by OMM consumer and NIP applications to establish outbound connections to a listening socket.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static int initialize(InitArgs initArgs,
                             Error error)
        Initializes the UPA transport API and all internal members.
        This is the first method called when using the UPA. It initializes internal data structures.
        Parameters:
        initArgs - Arguments for initialize
        error - UPA Error, to be populated in event of an error
        Returns:
        TransportReturnCodes
        See Also:
        InitArgs

      • uninitialize

        public static int uninitialize()
        Uninitializes the UPA API and all internal members.
        This is the last method called by an application when using the UPA. If multiple threads call initialize() on Transport, they have to call uninitialize() when the thread finishes. The last uninitialize() call releases all internally pooled resources to GC.
        Returns:
        TransportReturnCodes

      • hostByName

        public static java.net.InetSocketAddress hostByName(java.lang.String hostName)
        Gets the IP address of a hostname.
        This method gets the IP address of a hostname in host byte order.
        Parameters:
        hostName - Hostname to get IP address for
        Returns:
        The IP address

      • userName

        public static java.lang.String userName()
        Gets the user name.
        This method gets the user name that the owner of the current process is logged in under.
        Returns:
        User name of user

      • connect

        public static Channel connect(ConnectOptions opts,
                              Error error)
        Initialize transport defined in opts if not initialized.
        Connects a client to a listening server.
        1. Initialize ConnectOptions
        2. Set ConnectOptions to desired values
        3. Call connect to create Channel
        4. Read or write with the Channel
        Parameters:
        opts - Options used when connecting
        error - UPA Error, to be populated in event of an error
        Returns:
        Connected UPA channel or NULL
        See Also:
        ConnectOptions, Channel

      • bind

        public static Server bind(BindOptions opts,
                          Error error)
        Creates a UPA Server by binding to a port.
        1. Initialize BindOptions
        2. Set BindOptions to desired values
        3. Call bind to create Server
        Parameters:
        opts - Options used when binding
        error - UPA Error, to be populated in event of an error
        Returns:
        Bound UPA server or NULL
        See Also:
        BindOptions, Server

      • queryVersion

        public static LibraryVersionInfo queryVersion()
        Programmatically extracts library and product version information that is compiled into this library.
        User can call this method to programmatically extract version information.
        See Also:
        LibraryVersionInfo

      • toHexString

        public static java.lang.String toHexString(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                           int startPosition,
                                           int length)
        WARNING: creates garbage Returns a hex representation of the data in the provided ByteBuffer
        Parameters:
        buffer - Contains the data to print
        startPosition - The starting position of the data in the buffer
        length - The length of the data
        Returns:
        String the hex representation of the data.
